data.name: American Council on Exercise (ACE)
data.about:
Founded in 1985, the American Council on Exercise (ACE) is a nonprofit organization committed to America's health and wellbeing. Over the past 25 years, we have become an established resource for both fitness professionals and consumers, providing comprehensive, unbiased, scientific research impacting the fitness industry and validating ourselves as the country's trusted authority on fitness.

Today, ACE is the largest nonprofit fitness certification, education and training organization in the world with 53,000 certified professionals who hold more than 59,000 ACE certifications. With a long heritage in certification, education, training and public outreach, we are among the most respected fitness organizations in the industry and a resource consumers have come to trust for health and fitness education.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Inspiring people to adopt new behaviors requires more than simply knowledge of behavior change philosophy or emotional intelligence. As a Behavior Change Specialist, you will possess the practical, hands-on skills needed to guide people toward behavior change in one-on-one, group and virtual settings. Through a comprehensive, interactive experience, you will learn from renowned experts and pioneers in the areas of psychology and coaching how to develop rich, productive relationships and then utilize those relationships to drive people toward long-term, lifestyle change.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Category
attrs.value: Group Fitness, Life & Wellness Coaching, Personal Trainer, Special Populations

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: ACE has reinvented personal training and is leading the charge to make personal training-personal again with the Integrated Fitness Training Model Â®. ACE is first fitness certification organization to educate fitness professionals on how the exercise sciences and behavioral sciences are both critical to ensuring long-term client success and puts those elements into a programming model that makes the sciences applicable in practical settings.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: You must be at least 18 years of age. You must hold a current adult CPR and AED certificate.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
Earning the advanced-level ACE Health Coach Certification demonstrates that you have the knowledge to develop sound, balanced weight-management programs that bring together the three critical components for long-term weight management success: nutrition, exercise and lifestyle change.

Learn more about how to advance your career with a Health Coach certification from the American Council on Exercise.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: You must be at least 18 years of age. You must hold a current adult CPR and AED certificate. Adtl requirements on ACEfitness.org

attrs.value: Life & Wellness Coaching, Personal Trainer, Special Populations

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
With the first NCCA accredited group fitness certification, ACE's group fitness instructor certification has led the industry in educating fitness professionals. The ACE GFI certification provides background on various group fitness modalities, like Pilates and step, while also providing a strong foundation on techniques necessary for all group fitness instructors. 

Learn more about how to launch your career with a group fitness instructor certification from the American Council on Exercise.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: You must be at least 18 years of age. You must hold a current adult CPR and AED certificate.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The job of fighting fires and responding to emergency situations is one of the most dangerous and physically demanding professions. To help improve the safety, performance and quality of life of uniformed personnel in the fire service, the Peer Fitness Trainer (PFT) Certification was developed by the International Association of Fire Fighters (IAFF), International Association of Fire Chiefs (IAFC) and the American Council on Exercise.

Learn more about how to become a peer fitness trainer with the American Council on Exercise.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: You must be at least 18 years of age. You must hold a current adult CPR and AED certificate.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
As a Weight Management Specialist, youâll increase your market value to the
67 percent of U.S. adults classified as either overweight or obese, and the thousands of athletes who need help managing their weight for performance reasons. Building your expertise in proper nutrition and hydration strategies will help you connect with people who want to lose weight, build muscle, decrease their body fat, improve their overall health and achieve long-term success, no matter where they are on their fitness journey.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Category
attrs.value: Life & Wellness Coaching, Nutrition, Personal Trainer

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: With 31 percent of American adults who take part in at least one sport or physical activity, an expertise in sports conditioning will help you with a wide range of clients. Earning a Sports Conditioning Specialty Certification will increase your marketability to elite athletes, fitness enthusiasts training for an event or young competitors who need to increase their balance, strength, agility and speed.

Category
attrs.value: Group Fitness, Personal Trainer, Sports Conditioning

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: With a versatility that ranges from competitive athletes to rehabilitation patients, and everyday people who need to improve their balance and joint stability, expertise in functional training can be applied to a wide range of clients. As a Functional Training Specialist, youâll be able to help people move more efficiently, prevent injury, improve their balance and flexibility, build strength, and improve their overall quality of life.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: With the number of yoga and Pilates participants soaring to 22.9 million in the past decade, specializing in mind body exercise can help you deliver holistic programs to the growing number of people searching for a more balanced approach to health and wellness. Become an expert in yoga and Pilates to improve posture, reduce stress, strengthen the core, build muscle, and fuel an internal connection with oneâs self.

Category
attrs.value: Group Fitness, Mind Body, Personal Trainer, Yoga

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
s an Orthopedic Exercise Specialist, youâll have the expertise to help the 
33 percent of Americans who report being affected by knee pain, and all other clients or patients hindered by muscle imbalances or musculoskeletal disorders. Expand your marketability by becoming an expert in restoring function in people following orthopedic rehabilitation. Learn to design exercise programs that incorporate appropriate progressions and strategies to improve movement, avoid injury and boost function.

attrs.value: Personal Trainer, Special Populations, Athletic Trainer

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
Becoming a Therapeutic Exercise Specialist will help you develop exercise programs for people with a wide variety of special conditions â including the 
43 million Americans who live with arthritis and the 4 million women who give birth annually in the United States. Learn to safely and effectively work with people who live with metabolic disease and various musculoskeletal disorders, and how you can use exercise to boost their quality of life.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: Becoming a Senior Fitness Specialist will give you the tools to safely and effectively train the millions of Americans currently over the age of 55. Aside from exploring how to connect with older adults, the expertise youâll gain will help you incorporate appropriate modifications and techniques to prevent muscle deterioration, improve bone strength, and boost quality of life.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Prerequisite
attrs.value: You must be at least 18 years of age. You must hold a current adult CPR and AED certificate. Adtl requirements on ACEfitness.org

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

data.name: International Fitness Professionals Association (IFPA)
data.about: The International Fitness Professionals Association is devoted to offering the highest quality learning experiences to individuals aiming to improve their lifestyle, and those aiming to improve the lifestyles of others. Our educational opportunities provide only the most practical and scientifically based health and fitness information that can be directly applied to âreal lifeâ experiences. It is with this dedication that the IFPA is committed to being the lifelong exercise and training resource to the entire fitness community.

certifications.title: Adapted Physical Education and Sport Conditioning Specialist

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The world of adapted physical education & sport is continually changing. The Adapted Physical Education & Sport Conditioning Specialist will help you stay abreast of those changes and provide people with disabilities the best physical education possible. 

The Adapted Physical Education and Sport Conditioning Specialist begins with foundational topics in adapted physical education and sport, including program organization and management, adapted sport, individualized programs, and instructional strategies. It helps teachers and leaders to plan, assess, prescribe, teach, and evaluate adapted physical education.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: The IFPA Flexibility Certification covers the most practical fitness training information to ensure the competency of IFPA certified flexibility coach. The information in the IFPA certification covers the essential principles necessary for all levels of flexibility coaching. Taking the time and effort necessary to truly master these concepts will result in a significant increase in your ability to provide safe and efficient training to your clients.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The IFPA Advanced Functional Trainer Certification is designed to teach the essential knowledge and skills required to train clients in a functionally specific manner. This revolutionary program provides the training theory combined with hundreds of movement demonstrations that will give the personal trainer the the requisite knowledge and practical ability to teach clients better ways to train for functional performance.

Successful students are expected to be capable of understanding the role that the core plays in all movements and thorough knowledge of how to assess, plan, and implement a functionally specific training program for both lifestyle improvement, as well as sport and athletic performance. The IFPA Advanced Functional Trainer certification program will also teach appropriate progressions for both short and long term improvement. Each trainer will have the knowledge to successfully design functionally specific programs with appropriate exercises and progressions.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

certifications.title: Advanced Lifestyle Fitness Coach Level I

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: The Certified Specialist: Advanced Lifestyle Fitness Coach Level I course combines the personal training skills of exercise management with lifestyle coaching skills of counseling, communicating, motivating and educating in order to develop the effective dialogues that are critical to influencing more people to begin and maintain a healthy and fit lifestyle.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

certifications.title: Advanced Lifestyle Fitness Coach Level II

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: One of the biggest problems we have as fitness professionals, trainers and coaches is that we think everyone thinks like we do, is motivated by what motivates us, communicates the same way we communicate and WE ARE WRONG! This course will teach you the different temperament, character, intelligence and personality characteristics of sixteen separate and distinct personalities and the occasional blend of these personalities. This course will teach you the most current and popular personality inventory tests so you can quickly and easily identify the personality of your client (and it wouldnât hurt for you to learn the intricacies of your own personality before you began working with clients).

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: IFPA Advanced Lifestyle Fitness Coach Level I

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

certifications.title: Advanced Physical Education Methods for Elementary Teachers

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: The course textbook has been thoroughly revised and updated by a team of veteran teachers who are respected authors in the field of physical education. Theyâve included the following new content and helpful features: 70 reproducible lesson plans that students can learn from in class and continue to draw on as they begin their teaching careers A handy lesson plan finder Sidebars with examples of how to put concepts into practice New mastery activities at the end of each chapter A glossary of key terms Expanded ancillaries for course instructors

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The IFPA Advanced Sports Nutrition Certification Course provides you with the most current, comprehensive and precise nutritional research, techniques and advice to help your clients maximize efforts in both training and performance. The Advanced Sports Nutrition Course provides the best, results-based information that athletes and everyone in fitness training need to gain an edge physically.

The IFPA Advanced Sports Nutrition Certification Course will help you make sense of all the hype and misinformation that is causing so much confusion among fitness professionals and clients alike. Going far beyond the typical food pyramid formula, this comprehensive course presents cutting-edge nutritional concepts tailored for applications by athletes in any sport and anyone serious about fitness and nutrition. This course breaks down the chemistry of improved performance into winning principles that ensure an athleteâs key energy systems are properly stocked at all times.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

certifications.title: Applied Body Composition Assessment Specialist Certification

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
Expanded, updated, and packed with new resources, the Applied Body Composition Assessment Certification brings both IFPA Certified Personal Fitness Trainers and students up to date on the latest body composition methods and equations for healthy and clinical populations.

 

 

This course has been expanded to include the following:

Equations based on the most recent research
Recommendations reflecting the latest developments in body composition methods
New material on measuring the body composition of clinical populations, including those with cardiopulmonary, metabolic, and wasting diseases and disorders
More comprehensive coverage of the theoretical and scientific bases of body composition assessment, including more extensive coverage of body composition models and reference methods
Several chapters are devoted to each body composition assessment method, including information on its assumptions and principles, prediction models, techniques for use, potential sources of error, and the most recent research on assessing changes in body composition. In addition, the authors discuss how to choose the best method and equations for a variety of healthy populations, as well as the clinical populations noted previously, taking into account age, gender, ethnicity, physical activity level, and disease.

Three appendixes provide practical tips for understanding conversion formulas for two-component models, tables that help you find appropriate methods and equations for your clients, and contact information for equipment manufacturers. More than 60 photos and illustrations complement the text. Personal Fitness Trainers have routinely commented that the course is full of helpful review and summary tools that facilitate absorbing the wealth of information.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: CPR,18 years of age,high School graduate

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

certifications.title: Biomechanics of Sport and Exercise Specialist Certification

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
Many updates have been made to this course for the benefit of both students and instructors alike. Additionally, the IFPA Biomechanics of Sport and Exercise Specialist Certification provides practical approaches combined with striking visual elements with clear and concise language to encourage active learning and improved comprehension.

This Certification includes:

More sample problems throughout the course to illustrate problem-solving techniques and how to effectively meet the challenges on a daily basis.
A printed quick-reference guide of frequently used equations
An original chapter on technology used in the study of biomechanics
Review questions at the end of each chapter to test the trainer's understanding of important concepts
Becoming an IFPA Biomechanics Specialist is ideal for those needing a deeper understanding of biomechanics from a qualitative perspective. This course not only prepares students to utilize the principles of biomechanics in the physical activity field, it is also extremely easy to understand and apply. If you only take ONE course in Biomechanics, make it the IFPA Biomechanics of Sport and Exercise Specialist Certification course.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: CPR,18 years of age,high School graduate

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
Everyone knows they need to exercise, so why don't they do it!?! The reason is not that they are lazy, or don't have the time, money, energy or they need to talk it over with their spouse. The reason is the fitness professionals have never had an effective consulting system to communicate efficiently with everyone. This course will teach you about seven different personality types, how they communicate, what motivates them to take action, how to find out their individual wants, needs, and desires; how to determine how to find the money for a fitness program, how to get them to make a commitment to a fitness program, how you present to each type, and much , much more.

Successful consulting with your potential clients is the "TRUE SECRET TO THE PERSONAL FITNESS TRAINING SUCCESS!!!!"

We are often asked: How do you become a successful Certified Personal Fitness Trainer?

The IFPA Personal Fitness Trainer Certifications Course teaches you everything you need to know to conduct safe and effective personal fitness training sessions and become a personal trainer. The course will teach you all seven phases of personal fitness training (IFPA-PFT) and what you need to keep your clients safe, but the IFPA CFCS is a Specialized Course.

This course will make you a Master of the first part of the critically important first stage of personal fitness training, and that is client consulting and fitness assessment. This Specialized Course will make you a master of the client consulting phase and enable you to sell your personal fitness training services to virtually everyone you talk to!

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The Human Performance Assessment Specialist Course provides students with lecture outlines to help them learn the key concepts. The course contains valuable instruction in measurement and evaluation techniques. The course also includes information on epidemiology and also develops international perspectives.

The Certified Human Performance Assessment Specialist features measurement statistics and enhanced efficiency in solving measurement and evaluation problems.

attrs.label: Exam Price

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The Kinesiology Specialist gives a great deal of attention to the phenomenon of physical activity. This course will assist students in viewing physical activity in new and exciting ways so you will be able to fully appreciate the importance of the discipline of kinesiology.

The purpose of the Kinesiology Specialist Certification Course is to help you appreciate the breadth and importance of physical activity, to orient you to the discipline of kinesiology and help you understand its relationship to physical activity, and to introduce you to the physical activity professions.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The Kinetic Anatomy Specialist Certification not only discusses the basic concepts of anatomy, it also lays the foundation for students to learn how anatomy affects movement of the human body. The course also discusses regions of the body: the upper extremity, the spinal column, pelvis, thorax, and the lower extremities.

The Kinetic Anatomy Specialist Certification Course contains text on bones, ligaments, muscles, tendons, retinacula, capsules, cartilage, discs, membranes, and other miscellaneous structures. The program includes detailed animations for the shoulder, elbow and forearm, wrist and hand, trunk, hip, knee, and ankle and foot. Each joint has a muscle-action analysis of each fundamental movement of every joint.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

certifications.title: Certified Life Span Motor Development Specialist

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The Life Span Motor Development Specialist Certification presents current topics in motor development from a unique approach. Students learn to improve their problem-solving skills by looking not only at the individual but also at the environmental and task factors that may affect growth and motor development. In addition, a life span approach has been integrated throughout the course, illustrating the range of motor skills in humans ranging in age from infants to adults.

The Life Span Motor Development Specialist Certification Course makes it easy for students with little or no background in the movement sciences to understand motor development across the life span. The course contains features that bring the subject to life. It also allows students to have one book for all their coursework relating to motor development.

Here is a brief glimpse of the information you will be reviewing:

Fundamental Concepts of Motor Development
Development and Aging of Body Systems
Development of Ballistic Skills
Interaction of Exercise and Structural Constraints
and much more!!!

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

certifications.title: Certified Lifestyle Fitness Coach: Recreation & Leisure Specialist

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The Lifestyle Fitness Coach: Recreation & Leisure Specialist Course introduces students to the foundational history, philosophy, and understanding of the field in relation to the individual and society.

The course also contains information on many different sectors of the field, presenting the multifaceted delivery system through parks, public recreation, nonprofit organizations, commercial recreation and tourism, therapeutic recreation, and unique groups.

The Lifestyle Fitness Coach: Recreation & Leisure Specialist Course also presents the different types of programming found in recreation and leisure services, including recreational sports; fitness, health, and wellness; outdoor and adventure recreation; and arts and culture. The course includes career directions and comes to a close with information on the nature of recreation and leisure as a profession.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
IFPA Medical Specialist Certification (MFS) awarded to IFPA Certified Fitness Professionals who successfully complete the Medical Fitness Specialist Certification Program. The program includes:

    *IFPA Personal Fitness Trainer Certification Course â Gold Package
    *IFPA Special Populations Trainer Certification Course
    *IFPA Sports Medicine Certification Course

The Medical Fitness Specialist Certification Program has been developed to provide IFPA Certified Personal Trainers with the knowledge, skills and abilities the will need to train the largest segment of society that suffers from a variety of disease, disability and dysfunction. Many Personal Trainers have adequate skills to train the âNormalâ healthy market; those with no medical restrictions to exercise, but most are ill prepared to safely and effectively train people with a medical restriction to exercise programming. The risks are compounded as a greater percentage of society presents with multiple disorders and a variety of restrictions for exercise management.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
This course takes students through every phase of curriculum design: foundational understanding of design, planning, implementation, and evaluation. Furthermore, it shows students how to document that their curriculum is working â a valuable asset in an era of budget cuts.

Other special features of The Physical Education Curriculum Specialist Certification: An Achievement-Based Approach include the following:

Opening Scenario, Expected Outcomes, and Making It Work special elements in each chapter to help students understand how to apply the bookâs content in school settings and in their future work as teachers or administrators
Instruction on implementing the curriculum and sharing it with others
Strategies for planning, implementing, and evaluating a curriculum and establishing credibility for it
Emphasis on student achievement as an indicator of a quality physical education program
The Physical Education Curriculum Specialist: presents the complete framework for an accountable curriculum that meets the diverse needs of students and the real-world challenges of physical educators.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

certifications.title: Certified Physical Fitness and Wellness Specialist

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
Research shows that behavioral change and motivation are vital to helping people adopt physically active, healthy lives. Physical Fitness and Wellness Specialist weaves motivational and behavior-changing strategies throughout the course.

The Physical Fitness and Wellness Specialist helps students learn how to change, the course provides much more than just the basics of fitness and wellness. It recognizes that students must consider many factors in attempting to accomplish their fitness and wellness goals. Thus, the Physical Fitness and Wellness Specialist not only addresses traditional aspects of fitness but also explores other influences, such as stress, nutrition, chemicals, injuries, environmental factors, and more. This course also integrates issues of special interest to minorities and women and contains more extensive, updated references.

In addition, the IFPA recognizes that each student is unique and that one fitness and wellness plan does not fit all â so we offer an individualized approach. The Physical Fitness and Wellness Specialist provides strategies to help the unmotivated, sedentary student take that first step to improve health, and strategies for the highly motivated, fit student to meet even higher goals. This course allows each student to do a self-assessment and create goals based on that self-assessment.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Category
attrs.value: Life & Wellness Coaching, Personal Trainer, Special Populations

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: You have asked for it! A physical and mental conditioning program that allows you to fully understand the movements. This course will cover the art and science of human movement as it relates to the Pilates Method. Joseph Pilates planted the seeds for what is now a mainstay in fitness centers everywhere.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: IFPA Personal Trainer highly suggested,Group Fitness

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The Sport Management Specialist Certification Course engages readers by offering a global perspective, current research and developments in the field. This course will provide students with a solid foundation in the field, allowing them to successfully progress through their curriculum toward a career in sport management.

The Sport Management Specialist Certification Course offers a mix of established theory and new thinking. This course contains information on international sport, legal issues, and ethics in sport management. The Sport Management Specialist Certification Course provides information on the increasing globalization of the sports industry, giving readers an understanding of the similarities and differences in sport management practices and applications around the world. By providing real-world examples, readers will be encouraged to broaden their horizons and to view sport management as the global enterprise that it truly is.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The IFPA Advanced Exercise Management Certification Course offers a complete, user-friendly program for developing strategies for fitness and exercise management that meets the needs of every personal training client, from healthy, elite-level athletes to clients with physical, pathological, social, or psychological limitations.

This course provides an interdisciplinary approach to developing, prescribing, and delivering high-quality fitness and exercise programs. In this course, you will explore how to individualize fitness programs to encourage more people to participate in regular physical activity and enjoy the many health benefits. With 70% of the population currently (as of 2008) categorized as morbidly obese, obese, or overweight, the advanced exercise management techniques you will learn in this course are absolutely essential in order to safely and effectively train these special populations.

Even more critical is to master the advanced exercise management techniques provided in this course. This will allow you to safely and effectively manage the additional special population groups, such as those with metabolic syndromes, which consist of glucose intolerance, hypercholesterolemia, hypertension, certain cancers, various cardiovascular and cardio-respiratory diseases and more, all resulting from the current Obesity Epidemic. Furthermore, the Obesity Epidemic has created both a Diabetes Epidemic and a Cancer Epidemic.

If you are a serious fitness professional and desire to help more people, or if you crave more knowledge and understanding of the personal fitness training career, then this course is for you.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

certifications.title: Certified Sport and Exercise Motivation Specialist

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The Sport Motivation Specialist Certification course provides a thorough introduction to the key concepts in the field. The Course focuses on group interaction and processes and discusses how psychological techniques may be used to help people perform more effectively

The Sport Motivation Specialist Certification addresses the various roles psychological factors play in health and in sports. The course also deals with main topics of psychological development and well-being that are important to both society and sport psychology, including childrenâs psychological development through sport participation, aggression in sport, and moral development and good sporting behavior in sport and physical activity contexts.

In addition to thoroughly updating the material and including more contemporary examples, this course includes a trend-setting online study guide that provides an interactive learning experience for fitness professionals, trainers, and coaches. This online study guide is written to work directly with the text, and it includes more than 90 learning activities, a variety of retention and assessment tools, audio clips of experts in the field, and video clips of a sport psychologist working with athletes.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: This certification will provide you with a comprehensive introduction to the profession. The course draws on the combined wisdom, experience, and technical expertise of 24 professors and leaders in the field, who present diverse perceptions, philosophies, and practices for therapeutic recreation in the 21st century.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The IFPA Fitness Facility Manager Certification is designed to bring professionals business management principals to our industry. This course will also provide the essential operational guidelines that are so critical for the success of your fitness business. Equally important, this course will provide a means for evaluating your existing programs as well as the tools necessary for strategic planning that is critical to your future success.

Taking the time and effort necessary to truly master these concepts will result in a tremendous increase in your ability to effectively manage your fitness facility and programs. Use the many principles and concepts you will learn during this certification program to expand your horizons and improve your ability to incorporate new information into your management repertoire.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The Functional Muscle Training Specialist Certification will teach you the exercises that are most beneficial to various training goals and outcomes as well as providing you with specific training tools to correct imbalances in the body that prevent the optimization of muscle, joint, nerve and biomedical functions.

The enclosed DVD will walk you through the weight training readiness test, demonstrates proper technique for specific weight training exercises, and offers forms and scoring sheets to help you analyze your ability to train your clients effectively.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The IFPA Group Fitness Instructor Certification meets the demand for a current aerobic certification program that covers the foundation for all forms of group exercise instruction including:

    *Cardio Kickboxing
    *Indoor Cycling
    *Military Boot Camp
    *Body Sculpting/ Strength Training/ Flexibility
    *Step

The IFPA Group Fitness Instructor Certification is designed to teach the essential foundation for leading group fitness classes. This revolutionary program provides the training techniques and safety guidelines that can be applied to all group fitness training programs for healthy adults. Successful students are expected to be capable of leading group-training sessions while providing safe and effective training consultation, coaching and motivation. The IFPA Group Fitness Instructor certification program will also review ways to incorporate motivational techniques and important business techniques to assist in ensuring a successful group fitness program.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
Low Back Pain affects over 80% of the population. This IFPA Certification Course presents original research to quantify the forces that specific movement and exercise impose on the low back, dispel myths surrounding spine stabilization exercise and suggests preventive approaches and strategies to offset injuries, reduce pain and restore function.

This course contains extremely useful algorithms to aid exercise prescriptions, program design, guide therapeutic exercise and specially designed patient assessment provocation tests to help you determine the cause of back troubles, guide your choices in the best ways to eliminate problems, and improve the development of appropriate activities for functional gain. Techniques are provided for increasing spine stability dealing with both regional stability or mobility and regional stiffness present in individuals where most of the motion occurs at a single spinal segment.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

certifications.title: Master Personal Fitness Trainer Specialist - DL

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

certifications.title: Master Personal Fitness Trainer Specialist Track

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

certifications.title: Military Fitness Specialist/Fit For Duty Certification

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
When you are part of a Military Unit or a Military type unit i.e. Police, Firefighter, Emergency Medical Technician, etc. - YOU HAVE GIVEN UP THE RIGHT TO BE UN-FIT!!! All of the professions have membership in the "Warrior Class" and as such, you must be prepared for a critical situation at anytime. Your calling requires you to have a far superior level of fitness in all of the IFPA "Ten Components of Fitness": Strength, Speed, Power, Anaerobic Endurance, Aerobic Endurance, Agility, Balance, Coordination, Flexibility and Body Composition.

All Warriors must take their physical fitness programming seriously. Initially, aiming for "Physically Fit" will be adequate, but for those "On-the-Line" that may be suddenly thrust into a combat situation, a violent fight with a criminal or a life and death struggle with a raging apartment fire, you must eventually set a goal must higher. You should strive for "Athletic Development"!!

While your clients may never be required to run 26 miles, carrying 80 pounds of metal and armor to the Plain of Marathon, fight all day defeating an army four times their strength, pick up their armor and weapons and run 26 miles back to their city and prepare to fight again - defending it against invasion; They may be required to use their athletic skills to defend their life, their team's life or their country. Since they may never know when the critical moment may come, they MUST ALWAYS BE READY and ALWAYS maintain the highest levels of fitness.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
This course does more than simply present the latest research. Instead, it challenges students not only to grasp but also to apply the fundamental concepts of motor performance and learning to a variety of real-world settings, including teaching, coaching, the design of performer-friendly equipment and work environments, rehabilitation, and everyday motor skill learning.
Significantly updated with current research, new learning features, and more references, the fifth edition of Motor Control and Learning: A Behavioral Emphasis expertly combines text, figures, and practical examples to explain this complex topic in a clear and comprehensive manner. This outstanding introduction to the field focuses on motor behavior that can be observed directly as well as the many factors that affect the quality of these performances and the ease with which they can be learned. Additionally, the text examines some of the neurological and biomechanical processes that create complex movement behaviors, reflecting the convergence toward a shared understanding of complex movement behaviors across the fields of motor behavior and motor learning, motor control, and biomechanics.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The IFPA Personal Fitness Trainer Bronze Package is our most basic PFT Certification package. The Bronze package does not include any DVDs or practice materials. If you are a visual learner like many of our members are, then we suggest that you purchase our most popular Silver PFT certification package or any of our other PFT packages.

All IFPA Certifications grant a 6-month study period after which you must take the exam. If you need an extension, please contact your fitness career advisor to discuss your options.

 
Bronze Package Contents
The IFPA PFT Bronze Package includes:

The Book on Personal Training Textbook
The Book on Personal Training Study guide
105 question (multiple choice) proctored certification exam (mailed directly to proctor)
Free admission to two day workshop (when available)

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: CPR,18 years of age,high School graduate

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The IFPA Personal Fitness Trainer Gold Package is our second most popular PFT Certification package because it includes our 7 DVD Instructional Video Set but adds three more very informative videos to help your personal training career. The 7 disc set echoes the concepts reviewed during our Personal Fitness Trainer Workshops so you can follow along in the comfort of your own home. For even more study materials, consider the next level and purchase our Platinum PFT certification package.

All IFPA Certifications grant a 6-month study period after which you must take the exam. If you need an extension, please contact your fitness career advisor to discuss your options.

 
Gold Package Contents
The IFPA PFT Gold Package includes:

The Book on Personal Training Textbook
The Book on Personal Training Study guide
Instructional video set (7 DVD set)
Introduction to Personal Training DVD
How To Be a Successful Personal Trainer DVD
World-Class Training Session DVD
200 question (multiple-choice) pre-exam
105 question (multiple choice) proctored certification exam (mailed directly to proctor)
Free admission to two day workshop (when available)

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$0.00
      Note: included in price of package

attrs.value: CPR,18 years of age,high School graduate

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The IFPA Personal Fitness Trainer Platinum Package is our largest, all inclusive package containing all the materials you need to ace the test and operate a highly successful personal fitness training business.

All IFPA Certifications grant a 6-month study period after which you must take the exam. If you need an extension, please contact your fitness career advisor to discuss your options.

 
Platinum Package Contents
The IFPA PFT Platinum Package includes:

The Book on Personal Training Textbook
The Book on Personal Training Study guide
2 Volume Workbook
Instructional video set (7 DVD set)
Introduction to Personal Training DVD
How To Be a Successful Personal Trainer DVD
World-Class Training Session DVD
Training Log
Practice Exam
Audio Lecture (11 CDs)
CD-ROM Workshop (10 CD-ROMs)
Fast Food Survival Guide (Book & CD-ROM)
Weight Training Exercise (Book & DVD)
Rules Of Engagement For Personal Trainers Book
Standard Operating Procedures For Fitness Professionals Book
Abridged Sports Nutrition Book
Business Planning Guide & Workbook
Calendar Of Training Book
Inspiration To Power Your Workout (& Life) Book
200 question (multiple-choice) pre-exam
105 question (multiple choice) proctored certification exam (mailed directly to proctor)

      Note: included in price of package

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The IFPA Personal Fitness Trainer Silver Package is our most popular PFT Certification package because it includes our 7 DVD Instructional Video Set. This disc echoes the concepts reviewed during our Personal Fitness Trainer Workshops so you can follow along in the comfort of your own home. For even more study materials, consider the next level and purchase our Gold PFT certification package.

All IFPA Certifications grant a 6-month study period after which you must take the exam. If you need an extension, please contact your fitness career advisor to discuss your options.

 
Silver Package Contents
The IFPA PFT Silver Package includes:

$0.00
      Note: exam price included in package

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The Pre & Post Natal Instructor Certification is a maternity fitness plan designed specifically to meet the needs of women before, during and after pregnancy. This certification includes exercise, diet and overall lifestyle information in order to have a healthy pregnancy and a satisfying postpartum experience.

Be strong, comfortable, healthy, and active throughout your pregnancy with the IFPAâs Pre and Post-Natal Certification.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The IFPA Program Design Specialist Certification prepares you to design exercise programs for specific client populations, eliminate training plateaus, and achieve maximum results for your clients. This course covers 40 individual exercise programs to create your own personal training arsenal. The IFPA Program Design Specialist Certification is also designed to teach the student advanced principles in strength training program design.

This course focuses on Biomechanical variations to exercise and ways to manipulate training systems to efficiently train individuals at all levels of fitness. The Program Design Specialist expands upon the exercise principles, safety, and anatomy principles introduced through the Personal Trainer Certification. Successful students are expected to be capable of creating a wide range of safe and effective exercise programs that utilize a variety of exercises for all major groups and for the most important secondary muscle groups.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The IFPA Senior Fitness Specialist Instructor Certification is designed to teach the essentials foundation for teaching senior fitness classes. This revolutionary program provides the training techniques and safety guidelines that can be applied to all senior fitness training programs. Successful students are expected to be capable of leading senior adult individuals and group-training sessions while providing safe and effective training consultation, coaching and motivation.

After completion of this course you will have the knowledge necessary to call yourself a Senior Fitness Specialist and you will be able to teach people how to reach new levels of fitness and to maintain that fitness. There will be opportunities to work with older people in their homes, at a community center, retirement community, or gym. The focus of this course will be to develop a long-term plan to insure a high level of function and independence for your clients for many years to come.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: The IFPA Special Populations Trainer Certification Course will provide you with the precise knowledge, skills and abilities that the personal trainer, sports medicine trainer and other medical and healthcare provides need in order to safely and effectively train people with 49 different chronic diseases, disabilities and dysfunctions. This includes all the top killers: Cardiovascular Disease, Cancer and Diabetes.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
Every sport has unique power demands. Whether itâs explosive running and jumping, a quick burst out of the starting block, or contacting and moving an opponent, developing the right proportion of strength and speed is crucial to optimizing athletic power. With the revolutionary speedâstrengthâpower continuum in Sports Power, you can determine the ideal mix of strength-based and speed-based power required for your sport.

Four to six week training programs designed for maximum results may be applied as presented or customized to individual needs using the seven-step program design process. Training exercises combine resistance training, plyometrics, speed drills, and cutting-edge power development techniques.

Train to excel in your sport. Every workout with Sports Power will put you another step ahead of the competition.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: People are spending tens of thousands of dollars and MORE, on drugs, surgeries and medical treatments and getting no relief from chronic pain. You can provide safe and effective exercise prescriptions to eliminate that pain . . . PERMANENTLY! Most athletic injuries can only be healed through the safe and effective use of exercise prescriptions; drugs can provide temporary relief from pain, but because the underlying injury has not healed, the patient often increases the damage to the injured area. This sports medicine course will provide you powerful knowledge to truly help people eliminate pain, heal their injuries and return to full, optimal functionality!

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: The IFPA Sports Nutrition Specialist Certification teaches how nutritional intake can maximize exercise training and boost athletic performance. This course explains how the body uses food for fuel and the different roles that key nutrients play in making us strong and healthy. This course was created to provide an understanding of sports nutrition concepts to help you find the best ways to understand and wade through the endless sea of information and the tremendous amount of misinformation concerning nutrition. This program is designed to provide sound, scientifically based understanding of sports nutrition and the recommendations established from modern concepts and research.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: The IFPA Strength and Sports Conditioning Specialist Certification presents principles and practices from twenty-two of the finest and most respected strength and conditioning coaches. The state of the art training prescriptions, modern training programs, workouts, and drills not only produce superior results, but also pave the way for a new era in athletic training.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The Certified Strength Ball Training Certification demonstrates key stability and medicine ball exercises, corrects common errors, and explains how variations of exercises can provide additional benefits.

The bottom line in real life and sport is that you are only as strong as your weakest link. For most people this is core, or torso, strength. How many people do you know with low-back pain? How many athletes have experienced abdominal, hip flexor, and groin strains? Strong legs and strong arms along with a weak core is an injury waiting to happen.

Strength ball exercises are fun to do because of the constant challenge. It is not only about lifting more weight. It is also about having fun exploring how to coordinate more complex exercises as they are presented to you. You will find endless variations of exercises. The constant challenge will motivate you, and athletes and fitness participants will respond very positively.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
This is a practical, easy-to-use course that is designed to help you develop a specific exercise program for your fitness or sports-training needs using a simple rubber band. Many professionals and top athletes use resistance bands and tubing exercise.

Why?

    *They allow you to add resistance in multiple directions - something 
      free weights and machines can't do.
    *Strength, Speed and Power are maximized
    *Every major muscle group is addressed
    *Sport demands can be simulated
    *Specific rehabilitation needs can be targeted
    *Easy to adjust - provides resistance for any level of strength and ability
    *Portable...the perfect travel workout!!

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: Take your clientsâ strength training routine to the next level. With the IFPA Strength Training Specialist Certification you will gain the knowledge, skills and abilities required to help your clients gain more muscle mass, strength, and definition with proven training routines and nutritional guidelines. In this IFPA Strength Training Specialist Certification you learn a method of organizing training to achieve optimum gains in strength, mass, and definition without encountering the pitfalls of over-training, stagnation, and injury. Different phases such as anatomical adaption, hypertrophy, muscle definition, maximum strength, and transition are manipulated according to individual training goals.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: The IFPA Tai Chi Instructor Certification program teaches the golden moves of the ancient art of Tai Chi. This program produces a level one Tai Chi Instructor ready to lead Tai Chi classes and build a profitable clientele.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The IFPA Women's Fitness Specialist Certification is designed to give you another powerful weapon in your fitness arsenal. Since men and women are so fundamentally different it is not beneficial for women to follow one of current fitness models that are based on the male paradigm. The Women's Fitness Specialist Certification goes beyond this male-based system by taking in account the physical, mental, emotional, and social differences between the two sexes. This groundbreaking model will open new doors for any professional working with women in a health and fitness setting.

This extensive course will provide you with invaluable advice, information, and exercise that will be extremely useful in a wide variety of circumstances. This knowledge will provide you a platform from which you can elevate yourself far and above the realm of the "typical" personal trainer. If applied correctly, this course can make you extraordinary.

The IFPA Women's Fitness Specialist course is designed to provide a sound, scientifically based understanding of concepts and recommendations related to training women. Typically women are given training programs that are gender based. This course will better prepare the fitness professional to design programs that not only motivate women but also take into account their physical psychological, social, and emotional differences. Secondarily, this course will examine the different stages of a woman's life, provide prescriptions and modifications for adolescents, pregnant mothers, postpartum women, and menopausal women. Finally, the Women's Fitness Certification will take an in depth look at training female athletes and preventing the female triad (Osteoporosis, eating disorders, and menopause). This course, like all IFPA courses, will raise the professional standard for the fitness industry.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: The IFPA Certified Yoga Instructor course describes the qualities and knowledge yoga instructors need in order to be competent and effective teachers. With practical and detailed instruction, tips, and tools, this course provides information on how to teach yoga with strategies for working with students of varying abilities. It helps develop the attributes of registered instructors who facilitate students' learning and awareness in the practice of yoga.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: The IFPA Youth Fitness Instructor Certification is designed to teach the student the basic concepts and principles that are essential to developing safe and effective fitness training programs for the healthy child and young adult. Successful students are expected to be capable of leading one-on-one fitness training sessions that address the goals and objectives of the individual being trained while providing safe and effective training consultation, coaching and motivation.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals

data.name: ZumbaÂ® Fitness (ZumbaÂ®)
data.about:
The ZumbaÂ® program is a fitness-party with a contagious blend of Latin and international rhythms that provides a fun and effective workout to a global community, either at home or in the gym. Through exhilarating, high calorie-burning fitness classes, Zumba FitnessÂ® has helped melt the pounds and inches off more than 12 million Zumba-enthusiasts in over 125 countries. Using easy-to-follow moves and exotic, high-energy music, Zumba routines successfully tone and sculpt the body while burning fat. 

Exhilarate, the ultimate ZumbaÂ® Fitness DVD experience is available in a seven-disc DVD collection. Other offerings include Zumbawearâ¢ apparel and accessories, Zumba GoldÂ® classes for active older adults and deconditioned participants, ZumbaÂ® Toning, ZumbatomicÂ® for kids, Aqua ZumbaÂ®, the "pool party" workout, as well as additional music soundtracks. For more information, to find a class, or to purchase the DVD Collection, please visit www.zumba.com.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: By transforming a chair into a sizzling dance partner, the explosive Zumba Sentaoâ¢ program strengthens your core, torches calories and sculpts muscle. Revolutionize your cardio workout with targeted resistance training and experience exotic world rhythms in red-hot, never-before-seen ways.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: By transforming a chair into a sizzling dance partner, the explosive Zumba Sentaoâ¢ program strengthens your core, torches calories and sculpts muscle. Revolutionize your cardio workout with targeted resistance training and experience exotic world rhythms in red-hot, never-before-seen ways.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: By transforming a chair into a sizzling dance partner, the explosive Zumba Sentaoâ¢ program strengthens your core, torches calories and sculpts muscle. Revolutionize your cardio workout with targeted resistance training and experience exotic world rhythms in red-hot, never-before-seen ways.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This course teaches you the foundation and formula to teach a ZumbaÂ® class. You will learn the steps to four basic rhythms (merengue, salsa, cumbia, reggaeton). You ll learn how to put these steps together into a song, and how to create your first Zumba class. We ll provide you with all the tools and resources you will need to teach a Zumba class. License: One-year basic Zumba license

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This course covers steps for four more rhythms (belly dance, flamenco, tango, samba) while reinforcing the Zumba formula for success in an easy, effective class for everyone. You'll learn advanced techniques, network and share choreography with the most dedicated and knowledgeable instructors, and spend time enhancing your professional skills. License: One-year basic Zumba license.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Must be a current Zumba Instructor (50% off for ZIN Members).

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This course is designed for new instructors who wish to teach the active older adult and addresses the anatomical, physiological and psychological needs specific to this population. It will also prepare you to teach students just starting their journey to a fit and healthy lifestyle and who want to join the fitness-party for the first time. The Jump Start Gold Instructor Training teaches you the foundation and formula to teach a Zumba class and prepares you to teach Zumba GoldÂ® classes by integrating the concepts of the Zumba Gold program. License: One-year basic Zumba license; Zumba Gold license as long as you are a ZINâ¢ Member in good standing.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This specialty course is designed for current Zumba Instructors who wish to teach the active older adult and addresses the anatomical, physiological and psychological needs specific to this population. It will also prepare you to teach students just starting their journey to a fit and healthy lifestyle and who want to join the fitness-party for the first time. The Zumba GoldÂ® program also includes a Zumba chair workout. License: Zumba Gold license as long as you are a ZINâ¢ Member in good standing.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Must be a member of the ZumbaÂ® Instructor Network (ZINâ¢).

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This Specialty course is the "pool party" workout for all ages. You'll learn how to teach safe, effective and challenging water-based workouts that integrate the Zumba formula and philosophy into traditional aqua fitness disciplines. License: Aqua ZumbaÂ® license as long as you are a ZIN Member in good standing. Prerequisite: Must be a member of the Zumba Instructor Network (ZIN). AEA (Aquatic Exercise Association) certification recommended.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Must be a member of the Zumba Instructor Network (ZINâ¢)

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This specialty course is designed for current ZumbaÂ® Instructors who wish to learn how to blend body-sculpting techniques and specific Zumba moves into one calorie-burning, strength-training class. You'll learn how to use weighted, maraca-like Zumba Toning Sticks to enhance rhythm, build strength and tone all the target zones. License: Zumba Toning license as long as you are a ZINâ¢ Member in good standing.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Must be a member of the ZumbaÂ® Instructor Network (ZINâ¢). Fitness certification recommended.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Kids love to crank up the music, shake, wiggle and have a blast with their friends. So why not get fit while they're at it? This Specialty course teaches you how to fuse the Zumba program's unique formula with the psychology and physiology relevant to teaching kids ages 4-12. You'll learn how to modify Zumba moves to get optimal results, and receive tips on discipline and class management. License: ZumbatomicÂ® license as long as you are a ZIN Member in good standing.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Must be a member of the Zumba Instructor Network (ZIN).

data.name: (ISFTA) International Sports & Fitness Trainers Association (ISFTA)
data.about:
International Sports & Fitness Trainers Association (ISFTA) was founded in 2000 by a team of medical and fitness professionals with the intention of providing training at a level superior to that which had previously been available. We are members of the Institute for Credentialing Excellence (ICE), the International Health, Racquet & Sports Club Association (IHRSA), Board of Certification for Athletic Trainers (BOC) approved provider, National Certification Board for Therapeutic Massage and Bodywork (NCTMB) approved provider, a provisional affiliate of the National Board of Fitness Examiners (NBFE), and approved by many individual state boards as a continuing education provider for allied health, wellness and medical professionals. We have been providing quality education for over a decade and have some of the highest standards in the industry.

International Sports & Fitness Trainers Association (ISFTA) is one of the fastest growing providers of Fitness Certifications, Specialty Certifications & Medical Continuing Education. We offer personal instruction through LIVE courses, workshops, seminars and self paced home study with instructors who guide you through every step of the certification & educational process.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The ISFTA Personal Trainer Certification qualifies you to enter the fitness industry with the confidence to provide basic fitness training services to the general population.  Upon successful completion, you can begin a career as a Certified Personal Trainer, either working for a health club or gym, or starting your own business.  The ISFTA Personal Trainer Certification is a GREAT first step to a career in the fitness industry. Most individuals who take this course have a sincere passion for fitness and a desire to help others to choose a healthy lifestyle as well. We are known to have some of the highest standards in the industry, and when you earn your certification, you will be recognized nationwide as a fitness professional.

The investment for this class is $399, which includes your course materials, live workshop and exam fee. If you prefer, you can choose the split payment option and register for just $199.  The final payment must be made PRIOR to taking your exam.  Space is limited and the sooner you register, the more study time you will have prior to the class.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: The ISFTA Rehab Fitness Specialist course is designed to teach Physical Therapists, Occupational Therapists, Massage Therapists, Chiropractors and others in the medical field how to transition a patient from a rehab setting to a post-rehab fitness program.  During this live workshop, therapists will learn how to integrate various concepts of fitness and the physiological impact of dynamic movement to their treatment programs. Anatomy, physiology and kinesiology are examined in depth to provide a greater understanding of the body.  It also prepares the therapist to provide a more comprehensive home exercise program that is more appropriate to higher level patients.

attrs.label: Exam Delivery Method
attrs.value:
In Person
      Note: With Optional ISFTA CPT Voucher

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Category
attrs.value: Exercise Physiology, Personal Trainer, Special Populations, Sports Conditioning, Corrective Exercise, Athletic Trainer

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
During the ISFTA Stability Ball Trainer Certification one day workshop, you will learn the wide array of benefits that stability ball training can offer to your clients/patients including core strength, posture, balance, body awareness, flexibility and even cardiovascular fitness. The ISFTA Stability Ball Trainer Certification  is the most comprehensive workshop available to-date. Topics include everything from ball sizing, inflating and neutral alignment on the ball to training for dozens of exercises that you can then take and apply to your clients/patients fitness or rehab programing.

This class is open to both fitness, health/wellness and medical professionals.

Please Note: Medical Professional do not have to complete and or PASS the exam in order to obtain CE credits for license renewal.

attrs.label: Exam Delivery Method
attrs.value:
In Person
      Note: Exam requierd for certification only.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Category
attrs.value: Group Fitness, Special Populations, Sports Conditioning, Corrective Exercise, Athletic Trainer

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The ISFTA Aqua Fitness Specialist Certification addresses the needs of a broad spectrum of potential clients, from young to old. This year-round fitness training option is low-impact and fun, making it ideal for seniors, children and everyone in-between, either one-on-one or in a large group setting. With the Aqua Fitness Specialist Certification, professionals can show clients that they have gone the extra mile to increase their fitness education with the latest facts and safety concerns in this fast growing and unique fitness field.
CEU Approvals:
4 ISFTA CEUâs

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The ISFTA Fitness Nutrition Specialist Certification will teach you the scientifically accurate and up-to-date way to get your clients to obtain the most out of their workouts.  Topics include performance-enhancing nutrition, supplement planning and the Food and Activity Pyramid for the 7 life stages. The ISFTA Fitness Nutrition Specialist Certification will teach you the skills necessary to be able to tailor individual nutrition plans for your clients specific fitness goals and needs.
CEU Approvals:
4 ISFTA CEUâs

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
Take the performance of your clients to the next level and beyond with the ISFTA Plyometrics Training Specialist Certification. Plyometric training is an essential part of conditioning for all sports requiring strength, power and speed. The ISFTA Plyometrics Training Specialist Certification will provide you with the tools and education needed to prescribe advanced plyometrics training programming to all fitness levels.
CEU Approvals: 4 ISFTA CEUâs

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: Our 2 day Intensive program includes more than 16 hours of lecture, demonstrations and practical hands-on application.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: PTIA is a premier fitness certification provider that will give you the education, skills and insight to become a valued professional, ready to enter the workforce! Our 2 day Intensive program includes more than 16 hours of lecture, demonstrations and practical hands-on application. Day 1: Classroom training; Day 2: Hands-On in the gym.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: Instructor for Personal Training Institute Of America

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: At least 7 years in the field of PT

attrs.value: Boxing/Kickboxing/Martial Arts, Dance, Exercise Physiology, Group Fitness, Indoor Cycling, Indoor Rowing, Life & Wellness Coaching, Mind Body, Nutrition, Personal Trainer, Pilates, Special Populations, Sports Conditioning, Yoga

data.name: Wellcoaches
data.about:
We train the best health & wellness coaches in the world. Our training is high-impact, evidence-based, and innovative. Our community of coaches are game-changers in their industries, from clinical, to corporate, government, and consumer well-being.

Why Become a Coach?
As a Certified WellcoachÂ® you become an expert facilitator of mindset and behavior change that generates sustainable healthy lifestyles, which prevent or treat disease, and foster well-being and thriving. You can impact some of the toughest challenges of our times: epidemics of obesity, diabetes, sedentary lifestyles, poor nutrition, chronic stress, distracted minds, and ever-rising healthcare costs.

Wellcoaches Mission
Cultivating world-class coaches who help people rise above the barriers to good health and thriving by making lasting changes in mindset and behavior. 

What Does Wellcoaches Offer?
We offer an extraordinary Core Coach Training Program that integrates the best of coaching science with rich practical experience. The design of our Core Coach Training Program helped set national standards and certification of health and wellness coaches, launching in 2016. Our Certification Program, which follows the Core Coach Training, offers two pathways to certification: the "Certified Health and Wellness Coach" for the health professional and the "Certified Personal Coach" for the non-health professional.

certifications.title: Certified Professional Health and Wellness Coach

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
We have built an innovative and robust coaching model we call the Onward & Upwardâ¢ model designed to enable professional health and wellness coaches to help clients optimize both mental and physical well-being. The need for coaching skills is compelling given that only 20% of adults are flourishing today by two independent and validated measures. More and more evidence is emerging to show that mental flourishing improves physical health which provides the basis for health and wellness coaches helping clients envision and achieve life goals that allow them to flourish and thrive physically and mentally.
The experiential workshops provide many fun, engaging, and transformational tools and exercises that you can use in your own workshops. The training topics delivered in teleclasses and workshops cover many evidence-based domains and their translation and integration in innovative ways into coaching principles, tools, and skills. We deliver a broad and deep approach to a variety of types goals that support outgrowing of old lifestyles â including performance, skills development, behavior change, and psychological skills.

We deliver introductory training in Bob Kegan and Lisa Laheyâs âImmunity to Changeâ program which is an elegantly succinct model of cognitive behavioral coaching â helping coaches help clients identify and overcome âhiddenâ or unconscious dysfunctional patterns â allowing coaches to work with clients with challenging life situations.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Wellcoaches Core Health and Wellness Coach Certification

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
Looking for a new career in healthcare? Become a healthcare leader and train to become a Certified Health & Wellness Coach!  

Our coach school was an industry first to be endorsed by the American College of Sports Medicine. We specialize in supporting health and wellness professionals in:

-Understanding human behavior change 
-Leveraging the science of Positive Psychology so clients flourish and thrive 
-Utilizing Motivational Interviewing techiniques which support a client in uncovering intrinsic motivation 
-Overcoming the resistance to change and uncovering self-efficacy 

All of our coach training programs are drawn from our work in developing the core coaching competencies explored fully in the Lippincott, Williams, & Wilkins Coaching Psychology Manual.

$650.00
      Note: Certification/Exam Fee is separate from Training/Program fee

attrs.value: The Home Fitness Professionals Association/Home Fitness Training Specialist Certification and approved continuing education Course serves as the perfect way to gain real world insight into the successful running of an in-home/mobile fitness business. As the premiere program, The Home Fitness Training Specialist Course equips participants with the knowledge and practical skills needed to successfully start and grow their own in-home/ mobile fitness training business.  This course offers participants the opportunity to learn exactly what they need to know about starting an in-home/mobile fitness training business.  As a course participant, you will enhance your ability to achieve business growth and limit the challenges and pitfalls one would normally have as an in-home/mobile fitness trainer. This course was created from the business insights of several successful in-home fitness trainers.
